H3.text: Which European country switched to driving on the right in 1967. SWEDEN

A4.text: Sweden had left-hand traffic (v√§nstertrafik in Swedish) from approximately 1736, but after the Riksdag passed legislation in 1963 changeover took place on 3 September 1967, known in Swedish as Dagen H.
